properties.property: { ## 最多返回1000条记录 size: #[size], "query": { "bool": { "must": [ #set($needComma = false) #if($strs) strs not empty #end #if($list) list not empty #end #* 注释内容 *# #foreach($condition in $conditions.entrySet()) out velocityCount:$velocityCount out foreach.index: $foreach.index out foreach.count: $foreach.count out foreach.hasNext: $foreach.hasNext #foreach($item in $condition.value.entrySet()) velocityCount:$velocityCount foreach.index: $foreach.index foreach.count: $foreach.count foreach.hasNext: $foreach.hasNext #if($foreach.hasNext), #end { "$condition.key": { "$item.key": #[conditions[$condition.key][$item.key],serialJson=true] } } #end #end ] } } }
